    void reset()
    Cleans and clears a sprite, completely resetting all of its values\n Is called when requesting a new RectSprite using SpriteManager.requestRectSprite()
    void setHeight​(float num)
    Sets height
    void setHitBoxOffset​(float x, float y)
    Sets the hitbox's offset from the sprite's position Hitbox position will be set to (x+offset.x, y+offset.y) during collision testing
